humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, two sentinel lymph nodes and two additional lymph nodes were assessed and found to be negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/4). Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions that two sentinel lymph nodes and two additional lymph nodes were negative (0/4). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
